name: part_008
file: tmp_大神ミオ５周年記念ライブ『ナイトループ』【 ホロライブ ⧸ 大神ミオ 】 [YqPVwYLcvrY]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_008.mov

scenes.description: Ookami Mio finishes explaining the resident card and introduces the full set purchase bonuses, including a signed postcard and a special situation voice clip.
A transition scene where Mio reflects on the 5th anniversary and introduces her new song 'Night Loop', announcing its MV release.
Ookami Mio performs her original song 'Night Loop'.

subtitles.original: よく分からないと思うけどねー
subtitles.english: I'm sure you don't really get it, though.

subtitles.original: はい、ちなみにシリアル番号は、えっと、それぞれ入っているんですけれど...
subtitles.english: Yes, and by the way, there's a serial number on each one...

subtitles.original: えー、シリアル番号全員が違うので
subtitles.english: ...and since every serial number is different...

subtitles.original: 世界に一つだけ、一枚だけのカードとなっておりますので
subtitles.english: ...it's a one-of-a-kind card in the whole world.

subtitles.original: ぜひ、ミオファのみんなはゲットしてみてください
subtitles.english: So, all you Miofa, please try to get one.

subtitles.original: そして、最後にこのグッズのフルセット...
subtitles.english: And finally, if you buy the full set of these goods...

subtitles.original: 買ってもらうと特典が二つあります！
subtitles.english: ...you'll get two special bonuses!

subtitles.original: 大神ミオ直筆サイン＆箔押し複製メッセージ入り
subtitles.english: An Ookami Mio hand-signed and foil-stamped message...

subtitles.original: 泉パパ描き下ろしのポストカード！イェーイ！長い長い！
subtitles.english: ...postcard illustrated by Izumi-papa! Yay! That's a long name!

subtitles.original: えっと、うちが直筆のサインを入れて...
subtitles.english: Um, I'll be putting my autograph on it...

subtitles.original: さらに箔押しの、箔押しじゃない、箔押しのメッセージが入った
subtitles.english: ...and it'll also have a foil-stamped message...

subtitles.original: ポストカードとなっております
subtitles.english: ...on the postcard.

subtitles.original: 泉パパのイラストで、さっきのパブミラーのイラストなんだけど
subtitles.english: The illustration is by Izumi-papa, the same one as the pub mirror...

subtitles.original: ちょっと差分で表情が違ったりするので
subtitles.english: ...but the expression is slightly different, so...

subtitles.original: ぜひぜひ、こちらも手に入れてください
subtitles.english: ...please, definitely get this too.

subtitles.original: そしてお次が、特典二つ目！
subtitles.english: And next up is the second bonus!

subtitles.original: 特典ボイス『5周年の後も君と一緒に』というテーマで
subtitles.english: A special voice clip with the theme "Together with you even after the 5th anniversary"...

subtitles.original: シチュエーションボイスを撮らせていただきました
subtitles.english: ...I've recorded a situation voice clip.

subtitles.original: ま、ちょっといつもね、ボイス撮るの少し恥ずかしいんだけれども
subtitles.english: Well, you know, I always find it a bit embarrassing to record these voice clips...

subtitles.original: 5年間一緒に過ごしてくれたみんなに感謝の気持ちを込めて
subtitles.english: ...but with feelings of gratitude for everyone who has spent these five years with me...

subtitles.original: シチュエーションボイス、台本から考えたので
subtitles.english: ...I even thought up the script myself, so...

subtitles.original: ぜひぜひ、ちょっと小っ恥ずかしいですが聴いてください
subtitles.english: ...even though it's a bit awkward, please give it a listen.

subtitles.original: さて、グッズ告知も終わったね
subtitles.english: Well, that's the end of the goods announcement.

subtitles.original: けど、なんか物足りないなー
subtitles.english: But I feel like something is missing.

subtitles.original: 君もなんか短いなって思ってない？
subtitles.english: Don't you feel like it was a bit short too?

subtitles.original: あー、そっか
subtitles.english: Ah, I see.

subtitles.original: 物足りないなら、もう一回5年目いっとく？
subtitles.english: If it's not enough, shall we go through the 5th year again?

subtitles.original: ここだけの話
subtitles.english: Just between you and me...

subtitles.original: ライブのタイトルの『ナイトループ』ってあるじゃん？
subtitles.english: You know how the title of this live is "Night Loop"?

subtitles.original: あれって気づいてたかもしれないけど、曲名なんだよね
subtitles.english: You might have already noticed, but that's actually the name of a song.

subtitles.original: この夢のようなライブが終わった後に
subtitles.english: After this dream-like live is over...

subtitles.original: なんとMVも公開されちゃいます！
subtitles.english: ...believe it or not, the MV will be released!

subtitles.original: じゃあ、心の準備はいい？いくよ！
subtitles.english: So, are you ready? Here we go!

subtitles.original: ナイトループ！
subtitles.english: Night Loop!

subtitles.original: 相も変わらず上ばかり見ておかしくなる
subtitles.english: As always, I'm just looking up and going crazy

subtitles.original: やる気は減っていく
subtitles.english: My motivation is fading away

subtitles.original: 昨日に賭けっこ明日に背を向け
subtitles.english: Betting on yesterday, turning my back on tomorrow

subtitles.original: 入れ褪せた過去とやり合ってんだ
subtitles.english: Fighting with a faded past

subtitles.original: 抑えつけるほどに嵩を増していく
subtitles.english: The more I suppress it, the more it grows

subtitles.original: 劣等感その多寡諸々
subtitles.english: Feelings of inferiority and so on

subtitles.original: 溺れる前に夜を染め上げなきゃ
subtitles.english: I must dye the night before I drown

subtitles.original: 粋じゃないポーズ決め込んで
subtitles.english: Striking an uncool pose

subtitles.original: 不満さっぽけ詰め込んで
subtitles.english: Stuffing away my tiny frustrations

subtitles.original: 叩き割ったらバフ一つまた一つ
subtitles.english: Once broken, I get one buff after another

subtitles.original: 飲み込めないくらい
subtitles.english: So much that I can't swallow it all

subtitles.original: ほら喰れてやるよクエを全部
subtitles.english: Look, I'll devour it all, every single quest

subtitles.original: ちゃんと噛んで味わいながら
subtitles.english: Chewing properly and savoring the taste

subtitles.original: 感想聞いてみてもいいですか？
subtitles.english: Can I ask for your thoughts?

subtitles.original: 僕ら灰を背負ったままナイトループだ
subtitles.english: We're in a night loop, carrying the ashes

subtitles.original: そう壊れるまで
subtitles.english: Until we break

subtitles.original: 愛をギュッとしたサイコーループだ
subtitles.english: It's a psycho loop, squeezed with love

subtitles.original: もう縛れないよ
subtitles.english: I can't be tied down anymore

subtitles.original: 正解すら間違っているんだ そうだろう
subtitles.english: Even the right answers are wrong. Isn't that right?

subtitles.original: 誰も彼もバカみたい
subtitles.english: Everyone and everything is like a fool

subtitles.original: イタイの飛んでいけナイトループだ
subtitles.english: Pain, pain, go away, it's a night loop

subtitles.original: そう足掻けるまで
subtitles.english: Until we can struggle

subtitles.original: やいのやいのどうしようもないから
subtitles.english: Since there's no helping the noise and chatter

subtitles.original: もう騙らないで
subtitles.english: Don't deceive me anymore

subtitles.original: あと少しで絶望と希望の境界線
subtitles.english: Just a bit more until the border of despair and hope

subtitles.original: 背伸びすれば届きそうな称賛
subtitles.english: Praise that seems reachable if I stretch

subtitles.original: 脱線したい
subtitles.english: I want to derail

subtitles.original: 脱線したい
subtitles.english: I want to derail

subtitles.original: うわって声漏らしちゃって目を逸らしちゃって
subtitles.english: Letting out a "Whoa" and looking away

subtitles.original: 凹み散らかすまでがワンセット
subtitles.english: Getting depressed is all part of the set

subtitles.original: やる気あんで毎日にニュな 己のバースデー
subtitles.english: Got motivation, every day is a new birthday for myself

subtitles.original: 諦めても諦めなくても
subtitles.english: Whether I give up or not

subtitles.original: 僕を置いて進んでく時間
subtitles.english: Time keeps moving forward, leaving me behind

subtitles.original: 抜け出せないなら乗るしかないじゃん しょうがないなあ
subtitles.english: If I can't escape, I just have to ride along. Well, can't be helped.

subtitles.original: 沸いてこうぜほらナイトループだ
subtitles.english: Let's get hyped, look, it's a night loop

subtitles.original: もう止まらないね
subtitles.english: It won't stop now

subtitles.original: 変になったのはどっちなんだか さあ分からないね
subtitles.english: Which one of us has gone strange? Well, I don't know.

subtitles.original: 明後日前で巻き戻したいの延長戦
subtitles.english: Wanting to rewind from the day after tomorrow, extra time

subtitles.original: 一か八か散か夜か 最後に笑うためだ
subtitles.english: All or nothing, scattered or night. It's so I can laugh at the end.

subtitles.original: 好きなだけ泣いて抗おうか
subtitles.english: Shall we cry as much as we want and resist?

subtitles.original: 妄想の自分が未来から手を振っている
subtitles.english: My delusional self is waving from the future

subtitles.original: 行こうぞ最果ての先へ アンハッピー
subtitles.english: Let's go, beyond the very end. Unhappy.

subtitles.original: まだ夜は明けない 煙るネオンサイン
subtitles.english: The night hasn't ended yet. Smoky neon sign.

subtitles.original: 不安掻き消そうぜ
subtitles.english: Let's drown out the anxiety

subtitles.original: まだ夢は冷めない 嗤うギミックノイズ
subtitles.english: The dream hasn't cooled down yet. Sneering gimmick noise.

subtitles.original: 今打ち消そうぜ
subtitles.english: Let's negate it now

subtitles.original: 僕ら灰を背負ったままナイトループだ
subtitles.english: We're in a night loop, carrying the ashes

subtitles.original: そう壊れるまで
subtitles.english: Until we break

subtitles.original: 愛をギュッとしたサイコーループだ
subtitles.english: It's a psycho loop, squeezed with love

subtitles.original: もう縛れないよ
subtitles.english: I can't be tied down anymore

subtitles.original: 正解すら間違っているんだ そうだろう
subtitles.english: Even the right answers are wrong. Isn't that right?

subtitles.original: 誰も彼もバカみたい
subtitles.english: Everyone and everything is like a fool

subtitles.original: イタイの飛んでいけナイトループだ
subtitles.english: Pain, pain, go away, it's a night loop

subtitles.original: そう足掻けるまで
subtitles.english: Until we can struggle

subtitles.original: やいのやいのどうしようもないから
subtitles.english: Since there's no helping the noise and chatter
